name: Deluge
short_description: Lightweight BitTorrent client with web interface. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Lightweight BitTorrent client with web interface. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Deluge is a self-hosted application focused on download, utility, torrent, p2p. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Deluge on your home server to lightweight bittorrent client with web interface. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Deluge to manage your download workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
